definition: to kill/to murder/to attack/to weaken or reduce/to smart (dialect)/(used after a verb) extremely
"The Hunt for Red October", a novel by Tom Clancy
pinyin: Lie4 sha1 Hong2 se4 Shi2 yue4 hao4

sentences.english: Only off Seal Island do 16-foot great white sharks regularly catapult themselves into the air in an effort to catch and kill these seals.
sentences.chinese: 在海豹岛附近海域，大白鲨常会从水中冲出猎杀海狗。

sentences.english: What was it that made you zigzag all over Paris like a hunted deer?
sentences.chinese: 又是什么使你曲里拐弯各地巴黎像猎杀鹿？

sentences.english: Hunt camels in the state of Arizona.
sentences.chinese: 亚利桑那州禁止猎杀骆驼。

sentences.english: Over-hunting for food and indiscriminate ag chemical use were the usually cited culprits.
sentences.chinese: 那时候，过度猎杀捕食和滥用杀虫药物都非常普遍。

sentences.english: It took a year of hunting before Magan killed her first deer. It was a doe.
sentences.chinese: 磨练了一年才猎杀到了第一头鹿，而且是只母鹿。

sentences.english: It took a year of hunting before Magan killed her first deer.
sentences.chinese: 马江猎杀到第一只鹿用了一年的时间。

sentences.english: Can be upgraded with hunter-killer missiles, searchlights, camo netting and smoke launchers.
sentences.chinese: 可装备猎杀导弹，探照灯，伪装网和烟幕弹。

sentences.english: Rather than skimming the sea, they plucked their prey from the ground.
sentences.chinese: 而且它们是从地面捕食而非潜海猎杀。

sentences.english: They are against all blood sports, especially foxhunting.
sentences.chinese: 他们反对以猎杀鸟兽为乐，尤其是猎狐。

sentences.english: Arrow-shooting is a normal skill for the cannibals, with it, they can hunt wild pigs.
sentences.chinese: 射箭是食人族平常必须训练的技能，猎杀山猪就靠它。

sentences.english: The African natives are hunted for bushmeat.
sentences.chinese: 这些非洲“原住民”正因为它们的肉而被猎杀。

sentences.english: Players too will be able to hunt down the wanted players in order to earn SXP.
sentences.chinese: 玩家也可以猎杀被通辑的玩家以获取SXP。

sentences.english: The right of destruction belongeth only to thine Elder.
sentences.chinese: 猎杀的权力只属于你的长老。

sentences.english: When otherwise unoccupied, the rancher engaged in hunting down coyotes.
sentences.chinese: 没事的时候，大牧场主人就会去猎杀土狼。

sentences.english: Their hunting means that the many other fish in ocean waters do not become too great.
sentences.chinese: 它们的猎杀意谓着许多在海洋中其它鱼数量不会变多。

sentences.english: Out shooting crows, he sees a beautiful girl in the neighbouring garden.
sentences.chinese: 出外猎杀乌鸦时，他看到邻近花园里的一个美丽姑娘。

definition: to hunt and kill (an animal or fish)
to prey on/to catch and feed on/to hunt for food
to fish by casting a net/to capture/to surround and seize
